content.p: The Equality and Diversity Committee (EDC) maintains pages on the School Workspace (accessible only with your University of Nottingham username and password), which contains more information on staff development. The University provides all staff members access to a wide range of over 300 short courses from academic language & management skills to interpersonal skills and well-being. The University also offers Equality and Diversity training courses. EDC information Short courses for staff Equality and Diversity training The School of Chemistry Workspace page for Academic staff and postdocs has an extensive range of resources from the staff handbook to research specific courses and information on sabbatical leave. There is also a Staff Development page for support staff (TS and APM families). The page for staff members gives useful links to training opportunities and HR. Workspace - Academic staff and postdocs Workspace - Support staff For all enquiries please visit: www.nottingham.ac.uk/enquire
